Welcome to P61 Viewer’s documentation!¶

P61ViewerMain¶

Executable script for the application. Launches the P61App (QApplication child class) and a P61Viewer (QMainWindow child class) instance.

class P61ViewerMain.P61Viewer(parent=None)¶

QMainWindow child
